metadata.title: CVE-2022-3447 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Custom Tabs in Google Chrome on Androidprior to 106.0.5249.119 allowed a remote attacker to spoof the contents ofthe Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity:High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
